tool_description: Calculates comprehensive nutritional information for recipe ingredients and portions, providing macro and micronutrient breakdowns with dietary goal analysis.

servings.description: Number of servings the recipe yields

nutrition_focus.description: Specific nutrients to emphasize in analysis

dietary_goals.description: Dietary goal context: weight-loss, muscle-gain, maintenance, heart-healthy

error_messages: Invalid ingredient format: Include quantities with ingredients (e.g., '2 cups flour', '1 lb chicken').
Servings must be positive: Provide a serving count of 1 or more.
Unrecognized measurement system: Use either 'metric' or 'imperial'.
Invalid dietary goal: Use one of [weight-loss, muscle-gain, maintenance, heart-healthy].
Ingredient not found: Some ingredients may not be in the nutrition database.
usage: Provide ingredients with quantities, number of servings, and optionally specify measurement system, nutrition focus, and dietary goals. Returns detailed nutritional analysis per serving and total.

macronutrients_per_serving.description: Protein, carbohydrates, and fat content per serving

total_recipe_nutrition.description: Nutritional information for the entire recipe

dietary_goal_alignment.description: How well the recipe aligns with specified dietary goals
